§ 42109. Consultation with other agencies The Federal Maritime Commission may consult with, seek the cooperation of, or make recommendations to other appropriate agencies of the United States Government prior to taking any action under this chapter. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 7, Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1551.)
